page.title: 14MY WEEKEND BY ELIZABETH 10
page.content:
On a Saturday morning my mum and dad and I go to Gloucester shopping.We go in the car.We usually go into McDonalds for a drink.We sometimes go into British Home Stores for lunch. After lunch we go home.When I get home I watch T.V until I have tea.Then I go outside to play until bedtime.
On Sunday morning I ride my bike to Pendock.At 1.0.clock we have lunch. Then we go over to Malvern in the car to see my Granny and Grandad. We sometimes take them up the Malverns. These are big hills. When you walk on them you can see for miles.
When we get home I usually watch television until I go to bed.
